Verses: 1 namakkul Nilainirkiradhum, Endrendraikkum Nammodiruppadhumaagiya Saththiyaththinimiththam, Naan Maaththiramalla, Saththiyaththai Arindhirukkira Yaavarum Saththiyaththinpadi Nesiththirukkiravalum,
2 therindhukollappattavalumaagiya Ammaalukkum Avaludaiya Pillaigalukkum, Mooppanaagiya Naan Ezhudhugiradhaavadhu,
3 pidhaavaagiya Dhevanaalum Pidhaavin Kumaaranaayirukkira Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvinaalum, Kirubaiyum Irakkamum Samaadhaanamum, Saththiyaththodum Anbodunkooda Ungalodiruppadhaaga.
4 pidhaavinaal Naam Petra Karpanaiyinpadiye Ummudaiya Pillaigalil Silar Saththiyaththile Nadakkiradhai Naan Kandu Migavum Sandhoshappatten.
5 ippozhudhum Ammaale, Naam Oruvariloruvar Anbukooravendumendru, Umakkup Pudhiya Karpanaiyaaga Ezhudhaamal, Aadhimudhal Namakku Undaayirukkira Karpanaiyaaga Ezhudhi, Ummai Vendikkollugiren.
6 naam Avarudaiya Karpanaigalinpadi Nadappadhe Anbu; Neengal Aadhimudhal Kettirukkirapadi Nadandhukollavendiya Karpanai Idhuve.
7 maamsaththil Vandha Yesukiristhuvai Arikkaipannaadha Anega Vanjagar Ulagaththile Thondriyirukkiraargal; Ippadippattavane Vanjaganum Andhikkiristhuvumaayirukkiraan.
8 ungal Seygaigalin Palanai Izhandhupogaamal, Poorana Palanaip Perumpadikku Echcharikkaiyaayirungal.
9 kiristhuvin Ubadhesaththile Nilaiththiraamal Meeri Nadakkira Evanum Dhevanai Udaiyavanalla;kiristhuvin Ubadhesaththil Nilaiththirukkiravano Pidhaavaiyum Kumaaranaiyum Udaiyavan.
10 oruvan Ungalidaththil Vandhu Indha Ubadhesaththaikkonduvaraamalirundhaal, Avanai Ungal Veettile Etrukkollaamalum, Avanukku Vaazhththudhal Sollaamalum Irungal.
11 avanukku Vaazhththudhal Sollugiravan Avanudaiya Thurkkiriyaigalukkup Pangullavanaayirukkiraan.

12 ungalukku Ezhudhavendiya Kaariyangal Anegam Undu; Kaagidhaththinaalum Maiyinaalum Avaigalai Ezhudha Enakku Manadhillai. Ungaludaiya Sandhosham Niraivaayirukkumpadikku Ungalidaththil Vandhu, Mugamugamaaip Pesalaamendru Nambiyirukkiren.
13 therindhukollappatta Nammudaiya Sagodhariyin Pillaigal Unakku Vaazhththudhal Sollugiraargal. Aamen
